abstract: American Brittany Bowe wins in 1,000 meters at speedskating world championships in Heerenveen, Netherlands; other world championship results noted.
lead_paragraph: Brittany Bowe led an American one-two finish in the 1,000 meters at the speedskating world championships in Heerenveen, the Netherlands, edging her teammate Heather Richardson.

headline.main: Americans Take Top Two Spots in Speedskating World Championships

snippet: Brittany Bowe led an American one-two finish in the 1,000 meters at the speedskating world championships in Heerenveen, the Netherlands, edging her teammate Heather Richardson.
